item.title: That place is a frick'ng CULT
item.description:
They continuosly FAIL to manipulate me

why i dont interact with my colleagues and teachers? cuz i think that is going to be fking waste of time for me. I dont wanna say it but my clg (and others) + the Education System has become a CULT. Plus there is also a few students who just always wants to dominate each and every environment. Anything goes slightly against their plans and they will start a drama (to catch attention). In my first yrs I didnt understand wtf...
